imagenes.descripcion: The profile contour gauge is a versatile tool for construction, carpentry and tiling. It allows you to duplicate or trace the shape of objects, which is useful when you need to cut materials to fit irregular shapes. By pressing the gauge against the object, the pins adjust to form an outline of the object. This outline can then be traced onto the material to be cut, ensuring a precise fit.

Masonry tutors for the construction of brick walls. These are tools used in construction, specifically masonry, to ensure that bricks are laid evenly and in a straight line. They are made of high quality stainless steel, which is durable and rust resistant.

The mortar spray gun is a valuable tool in construction. It is used to apply mortar or stucco to walls quickly and efficiently. The tool works by loading the reservoir with the material and using compressed air to spray it onto the surface. Depending on the accessories used, it can also be used for other tasks such as welding or painting.

The MARSHALLTOWN finishing trowel is versatile with rounded and square edges. It is made of high quality tempered steel with a lightweight aluminum alloy backing. The 16 X 4 Rounded Curved Handle is available with DuraSoft®, DuraCork® or wood handles.

The MARSHALLTOWN Concrete Edger 163BD is a tool for creating edges on concrete slabs. It has curved ends and a DuraSoft handle for comfort. The blade is blue steel and the dimensions are 6.25 L x 6.12 W x 3.25 H. This product is made in the USA.

The MARSHALLTOWN Stainless Steel Hand Edger with Adjustable Groover 3489D is a versatile tool that allows you to slide the groove along the blade to be specific when adding grooves to any concrete slab. The blade measures 14 x 5 inches and is made of heavy 16-gauge stainless steel. It is ideal for creating decorative edges on fresh concrete. The handle is DuraSoft for comfort. This product is made in the USA.

The Masonry Joint Raker 8 1/2 X 3 Joint Raker is a masonry tool for removing excess mortar between bricks to give a better finish. It has an overall length of 8 1/2 inches and a width of 3 inches. It is useful in restoration projects.

The Caulking Tool Kit is a set of useful tools for household caulking jobs. It is used to quickly press the tile grout liner and fill the tile joint with liner. It is made of high speed stainless steel and ABS plastic. This kit is widely used in bathrooms, kitchens, balconies, entryways and other parts of the home.

The EasyLean Trowel Support Tool from Joyful Flappers is a support tool for flooring installers. It is designed to assist your support hand during flooring work, allowing you to work in a more ergonomic and comfortable position. The tool has removable non-slip feet, allowing you to work on different types of flooring.

The Tile Installation Tool Vibration Machine is a high efficiency tile installation tool with a vibration frequency of 24000r/min. It has a 12000mAh battery and an additional battery for alternative use. This tool can increase the installation speed up to 5 times.

The Upgraded 90 Degree Stone Seam Setter is a professional countertop installation tool. It is designed with two vacuum suction cups for a reliable grip. It has two finely tuned adjustable knobs for precise leveling. The components are made of stainless steel and the clamping handles are made of aluminum.

The VEVOR Tool Belt is a rugged tool belt made of PU material with 22 pockets. It can be adjusted from 29 to 54 inches and has detachable tool pouches. It is ideal for professionals such as masons, electricians and carpenters.

Pointed trowel for various construction tasks. This trowel is perfect for a wide variety of construction tasks, including brick laying, setting plaster and tiling. Durable carbon steel blade, ensuring it can withstand the wear and tear of heavy use.

The grout finisher is made of high quality silicone, which has good elasticity and can be used for a long time. It helps to seal tile joints without having to mess. The grout sealer is easy to use and clean. simply wipe it with a damp cloth or sponge, and then dry it in a ventilated place.

The Drilling/Crack Hammer Masonry Hammer is a construction tool used for masonry work. This hammer is designed with a fiberglass handle and a non-slip grip for safe and comfortable handling. The 1000G and 800G versions refer to the weight of the hammer, which provides sufficient strength for most masonry tasks.

The 6 Ton Double Drum Compactor is an EPA/CE certified construction machinery. This compactor is ideal for compacting and leveling trenches on construction projects. Compactors of this type are known for their exceptional performance on flat or sloping terrain.

The Plastic Putty Knife is a versatile tool used in a variety of construction tasks. This knife is ideal for caulking, painting, repairing and decorating. The hollow handle provides a comfortable grip and the flexible blade allows for precise work.

The Hand Tool Pliers Disposable Plastic Bases Plastic Wedges Tile Locator Leveling System Tiling Installation Tool, a tile leveling system that helps ensure tiles are level and properly aligned during installation.
Ceramic tile 45 degree angle tile cutting machine bracket for smooth tile construction corner cutting tool

90 degree right angle laser level projects laser lines on surfaces for easy alignment and leveling. Produces a 90-degree laser beam on every surface. Has suction cups for mounting. Useful for jobs requiring precision, such as tile installation.

The Yescom Drywall Stilts 24-40 Adjustable Aluminum Tool Stilt with Knee Pads Protection for Painting Painter Taping Blue product are a pair of adjustable aluminum stilts, ideal for painting and drywall installation jobs. These stilts have protective knee pads and can support up to 225 pounds. The height is adjustable from 24 inches to 40 inches, allowing you to adapt to different heights.

Super Thin Diamond Porcelain Cutting Blade Tile Blade 7 is an ultra-thin diamond saw blade designed for cutting porcelain and granite tiles. This saw blade is universal for wet or dry cutting. The X-shaped teeth provide a fast and smooth cut. You can use it with an angle grinder or any type of tile saw.
Mason's chisel with hand guard, for stone, with ultra resistant flat end for demolishing, carving, descaling, breaking and crushing. It has a size of 12 inches.
Tile, glass, ceramic and porcelain cutter, excellent tool for construction, for quick cuts in places where it is difficult to access with heavy tools.
